mapper.select: select * from bbsPosts order by createTime desc;
select * from bbsComments where postId=#{postId} order by createTime;
mapper.insert: insert into bbsPosts (postId, authorId, createTime, content, taskId, praiseCount) values (#{postId}, #{authorId}, #{createTime}, #{content}, #{taskId}, #{praiseCount})
insert into bbsComments (commentId, postId, sourceUserId, targetUserId, createTime, content) values (#{commentId}, #{postId}, #{sourceUserId}, #{targetUserId}, #{createTime}, #{content})
